channel.title: Notable Artists Born Today
channel.description: RSS feed of notable writers, poets, directors, and actors born on this day in history.

item.title: Clyde Phillips (writer)
item.description: Clyde B. Phillips (born October 3, 1957) is an American film producer, television writer, television producer, and novelist.

item.title: Chris McNally (actor)
item.description: Christopher McNally (born November 8, 1988) is a Canadian-born actor most noted for his role as Lucas Bouchard in the Hallmark Channel series When Calls the Heart (2019–present).

item.title: John Sharp (actor)
item.description: John Herbert Sharp ((1920-08-05)5 August 1920 – (1992-11-26)26 November 1992) was a British actor who made numerous appearances on television during a career spanning 42 years.

item.title: David Thornton (actor)
item.description: David Farrington Thornton (born May 4, 1953) is an American actor. He has appeared in John Q, Home Alone 3 as Earl Unger, Law & Order, The Notebook, and The Other Woman, among other roles. He is the husband of singer, songwriter and actress Cyndi Lauper.

item.title: Andrew Wilson (actor)
item.description: Andrew Cunningham Wilson (born August 22, 1964) is an American actor and director. He is the older brother of actors Owen Wilson and Luke Wilson.

item.title: Robert Ellis (actor, born 1933)
item.description: Robert Ellis (August 24, 1933 – November 23, 1973) was an American film and television actor in the 1940s and 1950s, who was the last actor to play Henry Aldrich on the radio series The Aldrich Family.
